data.body: Add README section and PROMPT.md, implement 'foolery prompt' subcommand to append guidance to AGENTS.md and/or CLAUDE.md, prompt during setup to apply guidance (highly recommended), and add doctor warnings when guidance prompt is missing from repo prompt files.
data.description: Add README section and PROMPT.md, implement 'foolery prompt' subcommand to append guidance to AGENTS.md and/or CLAUDE.md, prompt during setup to apply guidance (highly recommended), and add doctor warnings when guidance prompt is missing from repo prompt files.
data.title: Add Foolery guidance prompt flow (README/PROMPT.md/CLI/setup/doctor)
